extension.description: Brings Online Scout Manager (OSM) programme content to your site

field.name: instructions1
field.label: OSM Credentials
field.description: You must supply credentials for your OSM Account - this is NOT your user name and password. Log into OSM, go to Settings->My Account Details->Developer Tools and click the Create Application button, name the application and click Save. Copy the OAuth Client ID and OAuth Secret that OSM displays. No further configuration inside OSM is necessary.

field.name: clientId
field.label: OSM OAuth Client ID
field.description: Client ID from OSM Application for OAuth authentication

field.name: clientSecret
field.label: OSM OAuth Client Secret
field.description: Client Secret from OSM Application for OAuth authentication

field.name: instructions2
field.label: Section
field.description: You must supply the section name or section ID that you want to display. This can be found by logging into OSM, the full section name must be used including the hyphen but not including your group name e.g. 'Beavers - Kits Colony'.

field.name: sectionName
field.label: Section Name or ID
field.description: The full name of the section or the numeric ID given to the section in the OSM API

field.name: showNotFound
field.label: Show When there is no Next Meeting Scheduled
field.description: The module will give no output at all if the next meeting can't be found because nothing is scheduled in OSM (default show)

field.name: showNotes
field.label: Show Meeting Notes
field.description: Whether to hide the meeting notes (default show)

field.name: css
field.label: Custom CSS
field.description: You can style the output using CSS and the class names mod_osm_header (for the title of the meeting), mod_osm_datetime (for the date and time of the meeting) and mod_osm_notes (for the meeting notes, if shown)
